tool_description: Tracks real-time performance of active promotional campaigns including conversion rates, revenue impact, customer engagement, and goal achievement metrics.

campaign_ids.description: List of campaign identifiers to track

metrics_to_track.description: Metrics to monitor: conversion_rate, revenue, orders, customer_acquisition, engagement

reporting_frequency.description: How often to update metrics: hourly, daily, real_time

benchmark_comparison.description: Whether to compare against historical benchmarks

error_messages: Invalid campaign IDs: One or more campaign identifiers not found.
Invalid metrics: Use valid metrics from [conversion_rate, revenue, orders, customer_acquisition, engagement].
Invalid reporting frequency: Use one of [hourly, daily, real_time].
Data collection error: Unable to collect performance data for specified campaigns.
Insufficient campaign data: Campaign too new or no activity to report meaningful metrics.
usage: Provide campaign_ids and metrics_to_track. Optionally set reporting_frequency and enable benchmark_comparison. Returns current performance data and trends.

current_performance.description: Current values for each requested metric

goal_achievement.description: Percentage of goal achieved for each campaign

alert_conditions.description: Any performance alerts or warnings triggered
